CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ferry Services}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Bus Stations}.

VE.A: Bus Stations's luggage loss rate in 2022 is {1.13} %.

VE.A: Regional Airports's luggage loss rate in 2019 is {1.79} %.

VE.A: Shared Ride's luggage loss rate in 2020 is {1.67} %.

VE.A: Ferry Services's luggage loss rate is {1.68} %, Shared Ride's luggage loss rate is {1.67} %, Bus Stations's luggage loss rate is {1.10} %.

EVJ.A: The global minimum total luggage loss rate is {7.70} %.

EVJ.A: The global maximum total luggage loss rate is {9.38} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Luggage Loss Rate fall between 8 and 9 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {7.84} % in {2020}, total value was {8.20} % in {2019}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Luggage Loss Rate go below 8 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Luggage Loss Rate exceed 9 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {8.67} % in {2021}, total value was {9.38} % in {2022}.

NC.Q: Between 2020 and 2021, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 2018 and 2019?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between {2020} and {2021} was {higher} than between {2018} and {2019}.

NC.Q: Between 2018 and 2020, did the total Luggage Loss Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2018 and 2019?
NC.A: The change in total luggage loss rate between {2018} and {2020} was {smaller} than between {2018} and {2019}.

NC.Q: Between 2019 and 2021, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 2018 and 2020?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between {2019} and {2021} was {higher} than between {2018} and {2020}.

NC.Q: Between 2019 and 2022, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 2018 and 2021?
